VIBE WITH THE FLOCK.
PLAN YOUR NIGHT
Tropical, unpretentious, and always a vibe â€” Tipsy Flamingo is Downtown Miamiâ€™s go-to cocktail bar for bold drinks and feel-good music.
Whether you're easing into happy hour or riding the late-night wave, Tipsy Flamingo serves up bold cocktails, feel-good music, and a Miami vibe that never misses. Itâ€™s the kind of place you stumble into once â€” and keep coming back to.

COCKTAIL MENU
UPCOMING EVENTS
Saoco Sundays
Last Sunday of the Month | 9PM
Old-school reggaetÃ³n, cocktails, and a little perreo to close out your weekend.
RSVP
here
for a free welcome drink.
Daily Happy Hour
5PMâ€“9PM
$4 beers, $5 wine, $6 mixed drinks, $7 select cocktails. Early drinks, tropical vibes.
Miami Music Mondays
Starting 9PM
Local DJs bring the heat. $10 Margaritas keep it cool.
Tipsy Tuesdays
9PMâ€“12AM
Ladies drink FREE (well drinks). Bring the crew â€” the vibes are complimentary.
Throwback Thursdays
9PMâ€“Close
â€™90s and 2000s hits all night. Two-for-one Faded Love cocktails to match the mood.
Friday & Saturday Vibes
Late â€™til Later
Weekend energy. Elevated cocktails. Let the night run wild.
Downtown Miami Jazz Night
Every Wednesday | 9PM
Live Latin jazz, crisp martinis, and craft charcuterie â€” every Wednesday at Tipsy Flamingo, starting 8PM.
Late Night Happy Hour
Thu-Sat | 1AMâ€”Close
$4 beer & wine, $5 mixed drinks, $7 classics and shots â€” every Thuâ€“Sat from 1AM to close. Late nights hit different at Tipsy.
Book your event!
If you're planning a birthday party, bachelorette party, office happy hour, or just a good ol' get-together, Tipsy Flamingo offers custom private event packages. Tap the button below to inquire about hosting your event with us!
The Main Bar
Tipsy Flamingo is an intimate venue, perfect for events with 100 guests or less. The space lends itself to more informal gatherings, such as cocktail receptions, happy hours, bachelor/bachelorette parties, and more. Our focus is to provide our guests with a fun yet professional atmosphere anchored by our delicious cocktails, quality music, and excellent service.
We offer open bar packages, drink tickets, and custom event packages based on your needs. For more information, tap the button below!
Fill out the form!

If you're planning a birthday party, bachelorette party, office happy hour, or just a good ol' get-together, Tipsy Flamingo offers custom private event packages. Tap the button below to inquire about hosting your event with us!
The Main Bar
Tipsy Flamingo is an intimate venue, perfect for events with 100 guests or less. The space lends itself to more informal gatherings, such as cocktail receptions, happy hours, bachelor/bachelorette parties, and more. Our focus is to provide our guests with a fun yet professional atmosphere anchored by our delicious cocktails, quality music, and excellent service.

If you're planning a birthday party, bachelorette party, office happy hour, or just a good ol' get-together, Tipsy Flamingo offers custom private event packages. Tap the button below to inquire about hosting your event with us!
The Main Bar
Tipsy Flamingo is an intimate venue, perfect for events with 100 guests or less. The space lends itself to more informal gatherings, such as cocktail receptions, happy hours, bachelor/bachelorette parties, and more. Our focus is to provide our guests with a fun yet professional atmosphere anchored by our delicious cocktails, quality music, and excellent service.
We offer open bar packages, drink tickets, and custom event packages based on your needs. For more information, tap the button below!
